title: Radio logo
content:
Hi people!

I know this one is altered but I’m looking for a similar rounded and geometric font...  
Any ideas?

[http://img3.freeimagehosting.net/uploads/5457d70cde.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071117081401/http:/img3.freeimagehosting.net/uploads/5457d70cde.jpg "http://img3.freeimagehosting.net/uploads/5457d70cde.jpg")

Thanks!

/S

author: henriko

comments.content: Try a stroked Ronda or Moderna (for the special a-look)
